definition: lit. to look at flowers in the fog (idiom); fig. blurred vision
fog/mist/CL:場|场[chang2],陣|阵[zhen4]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Li (surname)
lining/interior/inside/internal/also written 裏|里[li3]
variant of 裡|里[li3]
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
surname Hua
old variant of 花[hua1]
variant of 花[hua1]/flower/blossom/also pr. [wei3]

sentences.english: Here we go again with the smoke and mirrors president.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，我们再次雾里看花的去批评。

sentences.english: The world is full of smoke and mirrors.
sentences.chinese: 这世界到处充斥着欺骗，犹如雾里看花。

sentences.english: Right now, confusion reigns on China's monetary policy.
sentences.chinese: 中国的货币政策目前可谓是雾里看花。

sentences.english: You said you perplex of couse, but I laugh and laughed.
sentences.chinese: 你说你雾里看花，我却淡然笑之又笑。

definition: amidst the clouds and mist/(fig.) mystified/puzzled
hard to distinguish real from imitation
what is true and what is fake
impossible to unravel/confusing
hard to tell if it's real or sham
irrelevant/can't make head or tail of
apparently right but actually wrong; specious (idiom)
lit. eyes obscured by a single leaf (idiom)/fig. not seeing the wider picture/can't see the wood for the trees
lit. not to know the true face of Lushan Mountain/fig. can't see the forest for the trees
pinyin: bu4 shi4 Lu2 shan1 zhen1 mian4 mu4

definition: not able to see clearly

blind people touch an elephant (idiom, from Nirvana sutra 大般涅槃經|大般涅盘经[da4 ban1 Nie4 pan2 jing1]); fig. unable to see the big picture/to mistake the part for the whole/unable to see the wood for the trees
lit. flowers in a mirror and the moon reflected in the lake (idiom)/fig. an unrealistic rosy view/viewing things through rose-tinted spectacles/also written 水月鏡花|水月镜花
to fathom/to make sense of/to grasp
hazy
to change unpredictably/unpredictable/erratic/treacherous
see 飄渺|飘渺[piao1 miao3]
